member.name: T:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Customer
member.summary: Customer is a person which makes Orders

member.name: P:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Customer.Address
member.summary: Provides Customer address as a string

member.name: P:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Customer.PostalCode
member.summary: Provides postal code of Customer address

member.name: T:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Item
member.summary: Item is a part of Order, connecting Order and Product

member.name: P:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Item.Quantity
member.summary: Provides quantity of Product in some proper Units

member.name: P:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Item.Product
member.summary: Provides Product. Product is a non-changeable in this context entity

member.name: T:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Order
member.summary: Order which was made by Customer, order contents are Items

member.name: P:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Order.TotalPrice
member.summary: Provides total price of all Order Items. Recalculating everytime when you call it

member.name: T:ValidataTestWebApplication.Models.Product
member.summary: Product is a dictionary of goods for Order
